snippet: New information about what local activists called a massacre of civilians indicated it was more likely a clash between the Syrian military and rebel fighters.
abstract: New details about what local Syrian activists call a massacre of civilians near the central city of Hama indicate that it was more likely an uneven clash between the heavily armed Syrian military and local fighters bearing light weapons; United Nations observers send a team to the village of Tremseh to investigate.
lead_paragraph: New information about what local activists called a massacre of civilians indicated it was more likely a clash between the Syrian military and rebel fighters.

headline.seo: Details of a Battle Challenge Reports of a Syrian Massacre

headline.print_headline: New Details of a Battle Challenge Reports of a Syrian Massacre
